Data: {"recipient_id": "ab3fd376-6d55-4a13-9910-85cd220d18c5", "custom": {"attachment": {"type": "template", "payload": {"template_type": "simple_form", "title": "Information for Ad Support Ticket", "description": "This form is used to collect user information in case the user needs additional help and a Jira Ticket needs to be filed with our Support Team.", "descriptionPosition": "top", "hidden_reply": true, "reply_text": "The user completes the submission of the form", "submit_button_title": "Send", "intent_name": "submit_form", "cancel_button": {"title": "Cancel", "type": "postback", "payload": "/cancel_for_input_data", "url": null, "is_enabled": false, "hidden_reply": true}, "is_mailerlite_form": false, "fields": [{"title": "Name", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-name.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_NAME"}, {"title": "Email", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-email.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_EMAIL"}, {"title": "Account ID", "type": "text", "icon_url": "", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "VAR_0001"}], "form_id": "ee27568f0b9f4826a7215c8197548501"}}}}

Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

Let's figure out why your account stopped spending. Could you provide more details about your campaign, such as the start date, bidding type, targeting or budget settings, and any recent changes in the last 72 hours? This will help us identify the issue.
Can I just give you the campaign id
Sure, please provide the campaign ID, and I'll do my best to assist you with the issue.

Thanks for providing the campaign ID. To further assist you, please check if there have been any recent changes in your campaign settings, such as budget adjustments or targeting updates. Also, ensure that your bidding type aligns with your campaign goals. If everything seems fine and the issue persists, I recommend reaching out to adsupport@newsbreak.com for more detailed assistance.

Thanks for providing the campaign ID again. If you've already checked your campaign settings and everything seems correct, I suggest contacting adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance. They can provide more detailed help regarding your account's spending issue.
